description: The username of the user committing this change
title: Admin Username

description: The user ID of the user committing this change
title: Admin User ID

description: The permanent URI for the resource being changed
title: URI

description: The permanent key for the URI of the instance of the resource
title: Key

description: The resource name of the resource being changed
title: Resource Name

description: The API action of the change; one of PUT, POST, PATCH, DELETE
title: API Action

description: The date and time at which the change was committed
title: Date and Time

comment: Enumerate the keys in the diff.
description: Attribute keys for values that have changed
title: Changed

comment: This is a dictionary, where the keys are the attribute keys that have changed, and the value of each key is an array, length two, containing the old value in position 1 and the new value in position 2.
description: A dictionary of attribute key to [old,new] values
title: Changes

comment: If child logs were created, list the URI for them
description: URIs for child logs, if any
title: Child Logs

description: Parent log if this operation was performed as a batch operation
title: Parent Log

description: ID field of the parent log
title: Parent Log ID

description: Preview logs are created for pending actions
title: Is Preview
